traits.Echolocation: The hook horror can't use its blindsight while deafened.
traits.Keen Hearing: The hook horror has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing.

actions.Multiattack: The hook horror makes two hook attacks.
actions.Hook: Melee Weapon Attack: +4+1d4 + 2 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.
